snippet: In Cora Bissett’s “Roadkill,” the subject is sex trafficking and the presentation style is the extreme close-up.
abstract: Cora Bissett play Roadkill, immersive site-specific drama being presented by St Ann's Warehouse, gives audience close-up view of world of sex trafficking; production, which takes place inside bus and apartment bedroom rather than traditional theater, takes viewers inside main character's world and allows them to bond with her.
lead_paragraph: In Cora Bissett’s “Roadkill,” the subject is sex trafficking and the presentation style is the extreme close-up.

headline.seo: Cora Bissett’s ‘Roadkill,’ Presented by St. Ann’s Warehouse
headline.main: Taking Audiences on an Unsettling Ride
headline.print_headline: Taking Audiences on an Unsettling Ride
